about_the_game:
Trick or treat? No tricks! 500 new unique high-quality photos is a real treat for jigsaw fans on Halloween!

Boo! Today you have a unique opportunity to remember Halloween night! Are you afraid of ghosts? Can you get a lot of tasty candies faster than your friends?

Enjoy high quality images, convenient controls and help, and heaps of clues and tools to help you configure the game to your liking. Special tasks and trophies make the game even more entertaining.

500 new photos means 500 ideas for a costume, face paint, and party food and decorations on Halloween!

- 500 high quality unique images
- well designed gameplay: hints,sort tool and magnifying glass
- optional game difficulty control. Infinite gameplay!
- custom styles of pieces with rotation
- save game progress and continue the game at any time
- tasks and colorful trophies for those who love excitement
- ambient, relaxing sound
- an enigmatic Halloween night atmosphere in every photograph
- get 500 puzzles for one purchase. It is beneficial!

name: Holiday Jigsaw Halloween 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
